content: संबुध् {c1c} <ab>U.</ab> {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To know, understand, learn; become aware of; <ls>Bk. 19. 30.</ls> {@--2@} To perceive, observe, notice. {@--3@} To wake up, rise from sleep. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To inform, acquaint with, give information about; तवागतिज्ञं समबोधयन्मां <ls>R. 13. 25.</ls> {@--2@} To address, call out to. {@--3@} To instruct. {@--4@} To admonish, advise. {@--5@} To wake up, rouse. {@--6@} To explain.
